sentences.english: She won the championship with a performance of 13-under in the four rounds.
sentences.chinese: 她并以4轮低于标准杆13杆的成绩顺利摘下后冠。

sentences.english: NO00,1. You need to sink this putt to make par.
sentences.chinese: 你这杆要推进才能平标准杆。
这一洞的的标准杆是四杆。

sentences.english: He had eagled the same hole earlier today.
sentences.chinese: 今天早些时候，他低于标准杆两杆进了同一个洞。

sentences.english: You can still make a birdie laying up.
sentences.chinese: 打短距仍可以低于标准杆一杆入洞的。

sentences.english: The Austria Pama's first hole only splits out the even standard bar.
sentences.chinese: 奥巴马的第一洞只打出平标准杆。

sentences.english: Callable securities could be called at different prices than par.
